channel.title: Strings as Collections :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Throughout the first chapters of this book we have used strings to represent words or phrases we wanted to print out. Our definition of a string was simple: a string is a sequence of characters inside quotes. In this chapter we explore strings in much more detail. Strings come with a special group of operations that can be carried out on them, known as methods. Strings are also what is called a collection data type. Letâ€™s look at what this means.
